chemoreception.notes: As parasitic crustaceans, Porocephalidae likely rely on chemoreception to locate hosts. This is inferred from their parasitic lifestyle and is common in parasitic crustaceans.

mechanoreception.notes: Likely present to detect host movement or physical contact. This is inferred from their parasitic lifestyle.

vision.notes: The presence or absence of vision in Porocephalidae is currently unknown based on provided information. Given their parasitic lifestyle, vision may be reduced or absent in some species.
